forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers overnight following a period of rain early. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing overnight. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
